resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74100</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74100</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-85b8-40a3-2187-5465a4c0d5ba#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gero-feszület, 970 k. Kölni-dóm, feszület.</string>
            <string language="en">Gero Crucifix, ca. 970, Cathedral of Cologne, crucifix </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gero Kruzifix, Ca. 970, Kathedrale von 
Köln, Kruzifix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crucifix de Gero, ca. 970, cathédrale de 
Cologne, crucifix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crucifix de Gero, ca. 970, catedral de 
Colónia, crucifix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crucifix di Gero, ca. 970, cattedrale di 
Colonia, crucifix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Γερο Crucifix, περίπου 970, καθεδρικός ναός της
Κολωνίας, crucifix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crucifix de Gero, ca. 970, catedral de 
Colonia, crucifix</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Gero, kölni érsek által állított kereszt a szenvedő Krisztust ábrázolja, szinte naturalisztikus hűséggel. A feszület a korai ereklyetartók példája.</string>
            <string language="en">The cross placed by Giro, Archbishop of Cologne represents the suffering Christ with nearly naturalistic fidelity. The crucifix is an example of the early reliquaries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus,  szenvedés,  Gero érsek,  ereklyetartó,  10.század,  Köln,  </string>
            <string language="en">Christ, Passion, Archbishop Giro, reliquary, 10th century, Cologne</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kreuz, das von Giro, Erzbischof von Köln 
plaziert wird, stellt den leidenden Christ mit fast naturalistischer 
Treue dar. Das Kruzifix ist ein Beispiel der frühen 
Reliquaries.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La croix placée par Giro, archevêque de Cologne
représente le Christ de souffrance avec la fidélité presque 
naturaliste. Le crucifix est un exemple des reliquaires tôt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cruz colocada por Giro, archbishop de Colónia 
representa o Christ sofrendo com o fidelity quase naturalistic. 
O crucifix é um exemplo dos relicários adiantados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La traversa disposta da Giro, Arcivescovo di 
Colonia rappresenta il Christ di sofferenza con la fedeltà quasi 
naturalistic. Il crucifix è un esempio dei reliquaries in 
anticipo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σταυρός που τοποθετείται από giro, Αρχιεπίσκοπος 
της Κολωνίας αντιπροσωπεύει τον υφιστάμενο Χριστό με σχεδόν τη 
φυσιοκρατική πίστη. Crucifix είναι ένα παράδειγμα των 
πρόωρων λειψανοθηκών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cruz puesta por Giro, Arzobispo de Colonia 
representa a Cristo sufridor con fidelidad casi naturalistic. El
crucifix es un ejemplo de los relicarios tempranos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ, Neigung, Erzbischofgiro, Reliquary, 10. Jahrhundert, 
Köln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ, passion, chèques postaux d'archevêque, reliquaire,
10ème siècle, Cologne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ, paixão, giro do archbishop, relicário, 10o século, 
Colónia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ, passione, postagiro dell'Arcivescovo, reliquary, decimo
secolo, Colonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός, πάθος, Αρχιεπίσκοπος Giro, λειψανοθήκη, 10ος 
αιώνας, Κολωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo, pasión, giro del Arzobispo, relicario, 10mo siglo, 
Colonia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
